name: Baboongamon
description: Baboongamon is a Beast Digimon. It is a Digimon with a strong sense of territory. It builds its home in places with a difference in altitude such as cliffs or rocky mountains. Its characteristic rocks, which cover a portion of its skin, regenerate and become harder each time they break. In addition, the individual with the hardest rocks within a troop is the leader in charge of their territory.
